articles.author: TOI Sports Desk
articles.title: Joe Root should drop 'Bazball' and play his natural game: Ian Chappell - The Times of India
articles.description: Cricket News: Former Australian captain Ian Chappell suggests that Joe Root should abandon the Bazball strategy and play his natural game. Read more to know about Root's recent struggles and Chappell's views on his approach.

articles.title: BHP says Australian support for nickel miners 'may not be enough' to save industry - Financial Times
articles.description: Group’s first-half net profit dropped almost 90% after metal’s price collapsed
articles.content: Then $199 for 12 months. Insight and expertise in your hands with the iconic FT print edition, delivered Monday to Saturday.
